elements.name: Verify API: getCicCount API return Total Cic Count

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getCicCount"
User calls "getCicCount" API with "Get" http Request
Verify cic_Count result is greater than 0
The API call is success with StatusCode 200

elements.name: Verify API: createCic API add Cic payload

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Cic Payload
User calls "createCic" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return Cic instance
Verify Total cic_Count increased by 1

elements.name: Verify API: createCic API with no cic Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Add" Cic Payload  with no Cic Body
User calls "createCic" API with "Post" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.cic.entity.Cic com.ibm.dc.cic.controller.CicController.createCic(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.cic.entity.Cic)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.cic.entity.Cic com.ibm.dc.cic.controller.CicController.createCic(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.cic.entity.Cic)"

elements.name: Verify API: getAllCics API return List of All Cics

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getAllCics"
User calls "getAllCics" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Cics
Total number of Cic in List is equal to getCicCount
Cic added exist in returned Cic List

elements.name: Verify API: getCicBySearchCriteria API, search no SearchCriteria

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getCicBySearchCriteria"
User calls "getCicBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Cics
Response should be list all Cics=getAllCics
All Cics should have Active Status

elements.name: Verify API: getCicBySearchCriteria API, search by 'cicId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getCicBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "cicId"
User calls "getCicBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Cics
Response should be list of Cics and size should be one
Cic added exist in returned Cic List

elements.name: Verify API: getCicBySearchCriteria API, search by 'cicName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getCicBySearchCriteria with Parameter: "cicName"
User calls "getCicBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Cics
Cic added exist in returned Cic List

elements.name: Verify API: getCicBySearchCriteria API, search by 'cicId' & 'cicName'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke getCicBySearchCriteria with Parameter: 'cicId' & 'cicName'
User calls "getCicBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Cics
Response should be list of Cics and size should be one
Cic added exist in returned Cic List

elements.name: Verify API: getCicBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'cicId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getCicBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "cicId" = "-9"
User calls "getCicBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Cics with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: getCicBySearchCriteria API, search by invalid 'cicId'

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "getCicBySearchCriteria" with invalid Parameter: "cicName" = "invalidCicName"
User calls "getCicBySearchCriteria" API with "Get" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify response will return List of Cics with zero records
Verify response will return List of Cics with zero records

elements.name: Verify API: deleteCic update Cic status as Passive

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke deleteCic with Parameter: "cicId"
User calls "deleteCic" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify CicStatus of particular Cic updated as Passive

elements.name: Verify API: deleteCic API,  with invalid cicId

steps.name: "System_Admin" User invoke "deleteCic" with invalid Parameter: "cicId" = "-9"
User calls "deleteCic" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 500
"message" in response body is "Cic with id - -9 not found"

elements.name: Verify API: deleteCic API, with no Param

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "deleteCic" with no Param
User calls "deleteCic" API with "Delete" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required Integer parameter 'cicId' is not present"

elements.name: Verify API: updateCic API add Cic paylod

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Cic Payload
User calls "updateCic" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is success with StatusCode 200
Verify Cic fields gets updated

elements.name: Verify API: updateCic API, with no Cic Body

steps.name: "System_Admin" User "Update" Cic Payload  with no Cic Body
User calls "updateCic" API with "Put" http Request
The API call is failed with StatusCode 400
"message" in response body is "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.cic.entity.Cic com.ibm.dc.cic.controller.CicController.updateCic(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.cic.entity.Cic)"

arguments.val: "Required request body is missing: public com.ibm.dc.cic.entity.Cic com.ibm.dc.cic.controller.CicController.updateCic(java.lang.String,com.ibm.dc.cic.entity.Cic)"
